mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT subject_esi FROM researchfield_rank WHERE ir_name=#{irName} AND version_num=#{versionNum}) a JOIN subject_esi b ON a.subject_esi=b.subject_name_en ORDER BY b.order_id ASC
SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT SUBJECT FROM esi_subject_incites WHERE name_cn=#{irName} AND version_num=#{versionNum}) a JOIN subject_esi b ON a.SUBJECT=b.subject_name_en ORDER BY b.order_id ASC
